Index: =================================================================== --- +++ @@ -0,0 +1,116 @@ +"use client"; +import { motion } from "framer-motion"; + +export default function UserInfo({ userInfo, setUserInfo, onNext, onBack }) { + const isValidEmail = /^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/.test(userInfo.email); + const isValidPhone = /^[0-9]{10}$/.test(userInfo.phone); // 10-digit phone + const isValidName = userInfo.name.trim().length > 1; + + const isFormValid = isValidEmail && isValidPhone && isValidName; + + return ( + +
+ + + setUserInfo((prev) => ({ + ...prev, + name: e.target.value, + })) + } + className="w-full px-4 py-3 rounded-lg bg-black/30 border border-gray-600 + focus:border-orange-500 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-orange-500 outline-none" + required + /> +
+ +
+ + + setUserInfo((prev) => ({ + ...prev, + email: e.target.value, + })) + } + className="w-full px-4 py-3 rounded-lg bg-black/30 border border-gray-600 + focus:border-orange-500 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-orange-500 outline-none" + required + /> +
+ +
+ + + setUserInfo((prev) => ({ + ...prev, + phone: e.target.value, + })) + } + className="w-full px-4 py-3 rounded-lg bg-black/30 border border-gray-600 + focus:border-orange-500 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-orange-500 outline-none" + required + /> +
+ +
+ + +
+ +
+ + + + +
+ + ); +}

commits.content:
"use client"; import { motion } from "framer-motion"; export default function UserInfo({ userInfo, setUserInfo, onNext, onBack }) { return (
setUserInfo((prev) => ({ ...prev, name: e.target.value })) } className="w-full px-4 py-3 rounded-lg bg-black/30 border border-gray-600 focus:border-orange-500 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-orange-500 outline-none" required />
setUserInfo((prev) => ({ ...prev, email: e.target.value })) } className="w-full px-4 py-3 rounded-lg bg-black/30 border border-gray-600 focus:border-orange-500 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-orange-500 outline-none" required />
setUserInfo((prev) => ({ ...prev, phone: e.target.value })) } className="w-full px-4 py-3 rounded-lg bg-black/30 border border-gray-600 focus:border-orange-500 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-orange-500 outline-none" required />
); }
